description:
Stay prepared for the good days, and the bad. Designed with rescue situations in mind, the Barricade is equipped with a bright orange handle, a glass breaker, and a seat belt cutter. And for the days you don't need the rescue equipment, the modified drop point blade is perfect for breaking down boxes and other everyday tasks.

  • 8Cr13MoV blade is easy to sharpen and holds an edge well
  • Black finish improves corrosion resistance
  • SpeedSafe® assisted opening mechanism and flipper tab makes deployment easy
  • Flipper tab doubles as a guard when the knife is open
  • Textured glass reinforced nylon panels add grip
  • Grippy glass reinforced nylon handles
  • Liner-lock design keeps fingers safe when using the knife
  • Deep-carry pocket clip is designed for right handed tip-down carry
name: Kershaw Barricade Knife - Unisex
